titleInfo.title: Western Canada: Route followed in 1906 by Elihu Stewart. D.L.S.

name.namePart: Dept. of the Interior, Forestry Br.

originInfo.publisher: Dept. of the Interior, Forestry Br.

mods.note: Includes notes of tree species, size & quantity and suitability for various forest industries. Route begins at Edmonton, extends northward to Ft. McPherson, westward to the "Site of Ft. Yukon and south through Dawson, Chilkoot Pass and the Inside Passage to Vancouver.
Report of the Superinendent of Forestry on a trip down the Mackenzie and up the Yukon Rivers in the year 1906. Being an Extract from Part IX, Annual Report, 1907. 4 l. of plates, 26 p.photos.
